sentences.sContent: A high level of anxiety was created by the introduction of cameras into the factory.
sentences.sCn: 工厂安装了摄像头，这引起了工人的高度不安。

sentences.sContent: It can help if you discuss your anxieties with someone.
sentences.sCn: 与别人谈谈自己的忧虑会有帮助的。

sentences.sContent: ...It is a dilemma that continues to be a root cause of anxiety both for myself and for thousands of other UK employees...

synos.tran: [心理]焦虑；渴望；挂念；令人焦虑的事

phrases.pCn: 焦虑症；焦虑性障碍；焦虑症候群
广泛性焦虑，广泛性焦虑障碍

remMethod.val: 来自anxious(adj. 担忧的； 渴望的)

trans.tranOther: the feeling of being very worried about something
